name: Zombie Arena (itch) (DuckHat)
description:
Welcome to the Zombie Arena Project!

This game was made with the proposition of learn more about Game Optimization, Mobile Adaptation and Design Patterns.

Is a non-profit project and made to increase my portfolio!

Things i've learned so far:
  1. All concepts learned during games released prior to this game were reviewed and solidified (you can see visiting the other games of portfolio and reading description);
  2. Integration between UI and player inputs;
  3. Use of EventSystem; Handling the interface created by Unity: IDragHandler;
  4. How to calculate mouse click position relative to a RectTransform;
  5. Synchronization of audio along with the animation;
  6. Animation events in Unity 3D;
  7. Looking for documentation to make the unity interfaces IPointerDownHandler and IPointerUpHandler work correctly;
  8. Code reuse efficiently and dynamically;
  9. Correct way to create custom interfaces to make the code scalable;
  10. Improved Object Pooling for various types of Game Objects;
  11. The importance oaf variety within the audios, to avoid repetitive effects;
  12. How to configure the project build; 
  13.  3D audio manipulation for greater immersion during gameplay;
  14. Design Patterns;
Credits

All arts are taken from Alura's course, all credits reserved for them.
